title: ****MASS AVE-SOUTH END RENOVATED GARDEN LEVEL 2BED WITH OUTDOOR SPACE
posting_body: AVAILABLE NOW!
AUGUST OR SEPTEMBER 1ST
MOVE-IN
A very spacious, and recently fully renovated 2 bedroom,1 bath rental apartment located on the corner of Massachusetts Ave and Tremont St in the South End neighborhood of Boston!
The unit is located in a professionally managed building that is located just steps from the MBTA and Copley Sq.
Heat and Hot Water are included in the rent price, there is shared laundry in the building, and this unit also comes with a large private outdoor space.
No dogs, cats ok-and no undergraduate students.
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
BenC @
Benjaminapartments .
com
